T02D2191:70a-1: badzra p'a ni m'arg'a shny'am ga bod skad du /
T02D2191:70a-2: phyag na rdo rje'i lam yan lag brgyad pa /
T02D2191:70a-3: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2191:70a-4: rigs lnga khro bo rigs gcig pas //
T02D2191:70a-5: gnyis po dbyer med rnam bzhi 'dras //
T02D2191:70a-6: bcom ldan de btud sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D2191:70a-7: gtum po khros pa'i gzhung bzhin bya //
T02D2191:70a-8: de la dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su gdong
T02D2191:70a-9: la sogs pa dag par byas te dri chu'i chag
T02D2191:70a-10: chag btab la / rnal 'byor pa dbang thob pas
T02D2191:70a-11: stan bde ba la 'dug ste rang gi snying gar
T02D2191:70a-13: de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang lha dang rgyal
T02D2191:70a-14: ba sras dang bcas pa rnams thugs bskul te bsod
T02D2191:70a-15: nams kyi tshogs bsags pa ni /
T02D2191:70a-16: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02D2191:70a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02D2191:70a-18: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje la //
T02D2191:70a-19: bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2191:70a-20: 'dod yon lnga dang rin chen bdun //
T02D2191:70a-21: bkra shis rdzas brgyad 'khor yug bcas //
T02D2191:70a-22: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams //
T02D2191:70a-23: bla na yod med mchod par bzhes //
T02D2191:70a-24: bdag gis thog mtha' med pa nas //
T02D2191:70a-25: sdig pa bgyis pa ma lus kun //
T02D2191:70a-26: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02D2191:70a-27: spyan sngar da lta mthol zhing bshags //
T02D2191:70a-28: bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang //
T02D2191:70a-29: gsang sngags kun bdag rdo rje can //
T02D2191:70a-31: dge ba mdzad la rjes yi rang //
T02D2191:70a-32: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni //
T02D2191:70b-0: dus gsum bde gshegs @70b thams cad kyi //
T02D2191:70b-1: byin gyi rlabs kyis dbang bskur la //
T02D2191:70b-2: gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
T02D2191:70b-3: skyon bral mthu ldan khyed rnams la //
T02D2191:70b-4: skye rga na 'chi me mnga' yang //
T02D2191:70b-5: 'gro ba'i don du sku sprul la //
T02D2191:70b-7: bdag gis dge ba ci bsags kun //
T02D2191:70b-8: gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms nas su //
T02D2191:70b-9: bla med byang chub thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2191:70b-10: sems can kun gyi don du bsngo //
T02D2191:70b-11: de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang /
T02D2191:70b-12: dga' ba dang btang snyoms bsgom mo //
T02D2191:70b-13: de nas ye shes kyi tshogs bsags te /
T02D2191:70b-14: aom sarba dharm'a sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes
T02D2191:70b-15: brjod pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom
T02D2191:70b-16: mo // de nas rang gi snying gar aa las byung ba'i zla dkyil du h'um bsam mo //
T02D2191:70b-20: byin rlabs bsdus sa bon la thim pas khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga par bltas te /
T02D2191:70b-21: de'i lte ba can gyi yang de ltar byas //
T02D2191:70b-22: de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D2191:70b-24: phyag gnyis pa sku mdog mthing ga g-yas rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul /
T02D2191:70b-25: g-yon sdigs mdzub thugs kar bkan pa /
T02D2191:70b-26: lto 'gros brgyan cing stag sham gsol ba /
T02D2191:70b-29: skra brdzes shing sma ra ser ba /
T02D2191:70b-30: zhabs gyad kyi 'dor stabs su bgrad pa /
T02D2191:70b-31: thugs las rigs bzhi yum dang 'khyud //
T02D2191:70b-32: seng ge stag dang ce spyang phag / sprul pa'i khro chung bsam mi khyab //
T02D2191:70b-33: me dpung 'bar ba'i bdag nyid bsam //
T02D2191:70b-35: ye shes spyan drangs mchod sogs bya //
T02D2191:70b-36: phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab la //
T02D2191:70b-37: sku gsungs thugs su byin gyis brlab //
T02D2191:70b-38: spyan la sogs pas dbang la //
T02D2191:70b-39: spro bsdu mi skyo'i bar du bsgom //
T02D2191:70b-40: de nas ting 'dzin gsum dang ma bral bar bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D2191:70b-41: aom badzra tsanda mh'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D2191:70b-42: gzungs sam rigs lnga'i snying po gang yang 'dra'o //
T02D2191:70b-45: yi ge brgya pa bklag / ye shes pa gshegs /
T02D2191:70b-47: spyod lam bzhi dge ba'i chos su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2191:70b-48: de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni /
T02D2191:70b-49: sa bon ram du 'bar ba yis //
T02D2191:71a-2: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis //
T02D2191:71a-3: bde ba chen po gso mdzad pa //
T02D2191:71a-4: thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs kyis //
T02D2191:71a-5: bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms par mdzad //
T02D2191:71a-6: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
T02D2191:71a-7: gtor ma las rab kun gyi mchog /
T02D2191:71a-8: las rnams kun gyi sngon du 'gro / yam ram kam dag sa bon las //
T02D2191:71a-9: rlung dang me dang thod pa'i skyed //
T02D2191:71a-10: aa las thod pa'i gzhal yas su //
T02D2191:71a-11: shu dang bi mu ma ra las //
T02D2191:71a-12: na dang go dang ku da ha //
T02D2191:71a-13: mi 'chi lnga dang rab gsal lnga //
T02D2191:71a-14: steng du sa bon dgod bya ba //
T02D2191:71a-15: aom dang h'um dang tr'am lam kham //
T02D2191:71a-16: lam m'am pam t'am bam dag las //
T02D2191:71a-17: yab yum snyoms 'jug bdud rtsi'i chur //
T02D2191:71a-18: dpa' bo gsum gyis byin brlabs la /
T02D2191:71a-19: brjod pas dkar dmar dngul chu'i mdog / ye shes bdud rtsir byin brlabs la /
T02D2191:71a-20: rdo rje khong gseng ye shes ljags /
T02D2191:71a-21: h'um mdzad sngags 'dis gsol bar bsam ;
T02D2191:71a-22: / aom tsanda badzra p'a na ye ma h'a ba lim ai dam /
T02D2191:71a-25: munydza ho sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:71a-26: de nas sman gyi mchod pa ni /
T02D2191:71a-27: aa mri ta p'u dza ho //
T02D2191:71a-32: de nas lhag ma bsdo bya ba /
T02D2191:71a-33: sngags 'di brjod pas thim par bsam //
T02D2191:71a-34: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nutpanna t'vata /
T02D2191:71a-36: zhes pa'i sngags kyis 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma gtang ngo //
T02D2191:71a-38: sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang ba'i lha //
T02D2191:71a-39: mche ba gtsigs shing me mdag spyan //
T02D2191:71a-40: me lce'i dbugs la 'jigs pa'i dar //
T02D2191:71a-41: phyag zhabs nor rgyas bu yis brgyan //
T02D2191:71a-42: nag po gdol ba'i se ral kha //
T02D2191:71a-43: dga' bo nye dgas snyan cha mdzad //
T02D2191:71a-44: sbrul gdug 'bar bas phyag zhabs brgyan //
T02D2191:71a-45: sku yi bzhin dang gzi brjid rgyas //
T02D2191:71a-46: khro gnyer smin ma dpral bar bsdus //
T02D2191:71a-47: ya sos ma mchu drag tu mnan //
T02D2191:71a-48: gshin rje'i cha byed 'di gas byed sku //
T02D2191:71a-50: gsus pa che zhing sbrul za ba /
T02D2191:71a-51: lag pa brdabs pa'i sgra yis ni //
T02D2191:71a-52: khams gsum rnams ni 'jigs par byed //
T02D2191:71a-53: sma ra ser po gyen du 'khyil //
T02D2191:71b-0: khro gnyer smin ma me @71b lcer 'khyug / kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzes //
T02D2191:71b-1: phyag g-yas gser gyi rdo rje bsnams //
T02D2191:71b-2: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub log 'dren gzir //
T02D2191:71b-4: 'dab bzangs rgyal pos skar gas mdzad //
T02D2191:71b-5: dpag tshad brgyad khri rgya mtsho'i zabs //
T02D2191:71b-6: zhabs kyi pus mor phyin mdzad nas //
T02D2191:71b-7: dbang po nyi ma phrag la khur //
T02D2191:71b-8: a'a li'i gad rgyangs chen po yis //
T02D2191:71b-9: kun du dgong cing 'khrug par byed //
T02D2191:71b-10: h'um dang phat gyi gad rgyangs kyis //
T02D2191:71b-11: ha ha bzhad cing drag shul che //
T02D2191:71b-12: klu rnams 'dul bar byed la bstod //
T02D2191:71b-13: de nas sngags kyi bye brag ni //
T02D2191:71b-14: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D2191:71b-15: aom n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2191:71b-16: som badzra p'a ni h'um badzra ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D2191:71b-17: aom badzra tsand sarba dusht'an ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa h'um phat /
T02D2191:71b-18: aom badzra p'a ni sa manta ka ra ma raksha tsitta badzra n'a ga sa manta h'um phat /
T02D2191:71b-19: rigs lnga gtum pa'i drag sngags te //
T02D2191:71b-20: rim pa yis ni shes par bya ;
T02D2191:71b-21: / tadya th'a nas bha ga b'an /
T02D2191:71b-22: ra dzny'a pa yi par du ni //
T02D2191:71b-23: gtum po khros pa'i rgyud bzhin no //
T02D2191:71b-24: de dag gdags pa'i drag sngags ni //
T02D2191:71b-25: sbyor bas yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D2191:71b-26: aom ha yaksha sod rdo rje na ri th'a rbad /
T02D2191:71b-28: mum rig mum rig m'a ra ya shig / sog tshig nan rbad /
T02D2191:71b-29: lus rul n'a ga m'a ra ya phat /
T02D2191:71b-30: ram ram dza la dza la /
T02D2191:71b-33: aom badzra tsanda sarba dusht'an krig nan /
T02D2191:71b-34: ae hur thum dza m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-35: n'a ga tsitta m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-36: yaksha tsitta m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-37: ru kram tsitta m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-38: ra dz'a tsitta m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-39: raksha tsitta m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-40: tsar tsitta m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-41: ham sham tsitta m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-42: ba ra sa tu tsitta m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-43: mus mun tsitta m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-44: ru kri tsita m'a ra ya rbad /
T02D2191:71b-49: tsi tra mu tra bzlog byer /
T02D2191:71b-50: n'a ga shig n'a ga glog n'a ga gho la nan /
T02D2191:71b-51: che ge tsitta m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2191:71b-52: gdug pa rnam gsum gsad bya ba //
T02D2191:71b-53: thog mar she dang rtso la sbyar //
T02D2191:71b-54: dregs pa bcu ni 'dul byed pa //
T02D2191:71b-55: gong ltar mthun dang bar pa gzung //
T02D2191:71b-56: bsrung zhing zlog par byed pa ni //
T02D2191:71b-57: 'gres kyis tha mar shes par bya //
T02D2191:71b-58: gzhan yang sngags kyi sbyor ba ni //
T02D2191:71b-59: 'di ltar rab tu bstan par bya //
T02D2191:72a-2: tsa la tsa la sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-4: thal chen dang yungs kar gyis bya'o //
T02D2191:72a-11: tad tre ba pra ti ga dza tu /
T02D2191:72a-12: hu lu hu lu sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-13: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'thab pa dang ;
T02D2191:72a-14: rnam par rtsod pa thams cad la bzlas pas zhi bar byed do //
T02D2191:72a-15: aom mo tsa ni mo tsa ya /
T02D2191:72a-16: mo ksha ni mo ksha ya /
T02D2191:72a-17: dzri rbam ba ra de sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-18: chu la btab ste gtor na bcings pa las rnam par grol lo //
T02D2191:72a-19: aom ta ri ni ta ra ya /
T02D2191:72a-20: mo tsa ni mo tsa ya /
T02D2191:72a-21: mo ksha ni mo ksha ya /
T02D2191:72a-22: badzra bam ba ra de sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-23: til mar la mngon par bsngags te /
T02D2191:72a-24: skye ba'i sgo la bskus na sbrum ma bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2191:72a-26: mo ksha y'a badzri pam sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-27: gur gum gyis gro ga la gang gi ming smos pa'i sngags mngon par bris la /
T02D2191:72a-28: spra tshil gyis gtums te dri zhim pos bkang be'i chu'i bum par blugs te /
T02D2191:72a-29: me tog dri zhim pa la dus gsum du mchod pa byas na /
T02D2191:72a-30: 'thab rtsod thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2191:72a-31: aom aa ma ra ni dz'i bant'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-32: sngags 'di legs par bzlas na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur /
T02D2191:72a-33: khyad par du 'brum bu la sogs pa la chu
T02D2191:72a-34: la btab nas 'thungs na 'brum bu thams cad zhi
T02D2191:72a-35: bar 'gyur ro // aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D2191:72a-36: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig bzlas bas sdig pa thams cad sreg par byed do //
T02D2191:72a-37: 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon la yungs kar la bsngags te gtor bas 'byer ro //
T02D2191:72a-38: byis pa gsar du btsa' ba la skam pa la
T02D2191:72a-39: rdo rgyus kyis bris te sgo gong du btags na
T02D2191:72a-41: aom dzam bha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-42: aom ma ni bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-43: aom pu rnna bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-44: aom d'a na d'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-45: aom bee shra ba n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-46: aom ki li ma li ni sv'a h'a aom pi tsi kunda li ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-47: aom mu khendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-48: aom tsa lendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72a-49: dzam bha la la gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor ba'i nor bsgrub pa'o /
T02D2191:72a-51: // / de nas rab gnas bshad par bya //
T02D2191:72a-52: gza' skar dus tshes bzang po la //
T02D2191:72a-53: bkra shis bum pa mtshan ldan du //
T02D2191:72b-0: 'dag chal la @72b sogs chu brgyad la //
T02D2191:72b-1: stod rtsa brgyad du gzungs brjod do //
T02D2191:72b-2: khrus khang gser dang mu tig can //
T02D2191:72b-3: rin chen sil ma spung bar bkru //
T02D2191:72b-4: ji ltar bltams pa'i tshigs bcad brjod //
T02D2191:72b-5: lugs ma bkru zhing me long la //
T02D2191:72b-6: po ti lha khang bkru bya'o //
T02D2191:72b-7: khrus byed na bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dgrol lo //
T02D2191:72b-8: sran phye dang 'bras yos dang til mar la sogs
T02D2191:72b-9: pa la ku sha'i pir gyis khrus bya zhing sngags
T02D2191:72b-10: 'di brjod / na mo sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D2191:72b-11: du rna du pa pa kra sta ye sb'a h'a
T02D2191:72b-12: 'di brjod / zhes brjod do // de nas ras
T02D2191:72b-13: kha tshar ma nyams pas dril phyis bya zhing sngags
T02D2191:72b-14: 'di brjod / zhes brjod do // de brjod do
T02D2191:72b-15: ; / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po spyan drangs
T02D2191:72b-16: la bdag gis dkyil 'khor bsgrub ste /
T02D2191:72b-17: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor mchod pa rdzogs pa'i rjes la
T02D2191:72b-18: rab gnas kyi lha rnams shin tu gsal bar byas
T02D2191:72b-19: te / ye shes kyi 'khor lo bar snang du
T02D2191:72b-20: bsdus te spyan drangs la gnyis su med par bstims
T02D2191:72b-21: te / la / dbang bskur rgyas btab la mchod pa shin tu rgyas par bya'o //
T02D2191:72b-22: de yang gser gyi thur mas spyan dbye ba'i sngags ni 'di'o //
T02D2191:72b-23: aom tsakshu dzny'a na tsakshu pra be sha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72b-24: snyan dbye ba ni aom karna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72b-25: shangs dbye ba ni aom na ga gandhe sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72b-26: zhal dbye ba ni aom mu kha ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72b-27: na bza' gsol ba ni aom ba tsan tsa li ka ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:72b-28: dung gi so mangs dang gser gyi spu gris rab tu byung ba dang /
T02D2191:72b-29: byang chub sems pa'i bya ba bya'o //
T02D2191:72b-30: pu sti glegs bam rnams ni rdo rje chos dang yum chen mor byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2191:72b-31: mchod rten ni rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2191:72b-32: rdo rje dang dril bu la sogs pa ni rang rang gi phyag mtshan du byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2191:72b-33: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa de dag thams cad
T02D2191:72b-34: la ye shes sems dpa' bcug la rgyas btab cing
T02D2191:72b-35: byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur la mchod pa rgya
T02D2191:72b-36: chen pos mchod la bkra shis chen por mnga' gsol
T02D2191:72b-38: lo// * // de nas bdun tshigs byed par 'dod na /
T02D2191:72b-39: bsnyen pa sngon du song bas gson po'i bsrung ba byas te /
T02D2191:72b-40: rus bu'am mtshan byang la sogs pa'i dri ma sbyangs te /
T02D2191:73a-0: 'dod lha'i thugs rjes gshin po ngan song @73a * //
T02D2191:73a-2: gshin po'i shes pa aa thung gnas pa de mtshan byang la bstims te /
T02D2191:73a-3: drag po'i sbyin sreg gis gshed phral la /
T02D2191:73a-4: dug sbyang zhing 'gro drug nas drangs te /
T02D2191:73a-5: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum //
T02D2191:73a-7: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum //
T02D2191:73a-8: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje nyid //
T02D2191:73a-9: dkon mchog bden pas dug mi mnga' //
T02D2191:73a-10: dkon mchog bden pas dug bcom mo //
T02D2191:73a-11: dug ka sh'antim ku ru ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:73a-12: zhes brjod cing 'gro drug nas drangs la dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur te /
T02D2191:73a-13: me mar gyis lam bstan la bde ba can gyi zhing khams su gnas spar ro//
T02D2191:73a-15: * // de nas sbyin sreg bshad par bya //
T02D2191:73a-16: zhi ba dkar zhing zlum pa la //
T02D2191:73a-17: ku sha'o ma can gyis bsreg 'bras chan dkar gsum mngar gsum dbul //
T02D2191:73a-18: ta la n+ya gro dha yis bsreg / gru bzhi rin chen mdzes pas spras //
T02D2191:73a-19: sman dang rin chen sna lnga dbul //
T02D2191:73a-20: dbang la dmar zhing zla gam la //
T02D2191:73a-22: de yi gzhal yas drag po ru //
T02D2191:73a-23: bcom ldan cho ga legs pa yis //
T02D2191:73a-24: d'ur ba shing thog la sogs dbul //
T02D2191:73a-25: drag po mthing nag gru gsum la //
T02D2191:73a-26: chu shing tsher ma can gyis bsreg / rdo rje lcags kyus spras pa la //
T02D2191:73a-27: dug dang khrag dang drag pos dbul //
T02D2191:73a-28: me lha'i cho ga rdzogs byas la /
T02D2191:73a-29: de yi gzhal yas drag po ru //
T02D2191:73a-30: bcom ldan cho ga legs pa yis //
T02D2191:73a-31: sbyin sreg sngags ni 'di ltar ro //
T02D2191:73a-32: aom aa gna ye dzva la ram /
T02D2191:73a-34: sh'a ntim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:73a-36: pu shtim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:73a-38: ba sham ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2191:73a-40: m'a ra ya ku ru h'um phat /
T02D2191:73a-42: na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
T02D2191:73a-43: ma h'a ya ksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D2191:73a-44: sarba sha tr'um zhes pa phrin las bzhi'i sngags gdags pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i'o /
T02D2191:73a-48: // / * // de nas gdon bshad par bya/ dbyibs legs mdzes pa'i mandala gsum //
T02D2191:73a-49: bdag dang nad pa'i bar du bya //
T02D2191:73a-50: dang po gzungs kyi bum pa la //
T02D2191:73a-51: gnyis pa smyag shad lcug mas bya ba //
T02D2191:73a-52: gsum pa ba su rigs drug dgod //
T02D2191:73a-53: 'khar gzhong sman gyis bkang ba ni //
T02D2191:73b-0: lcug @73b ma'i gdan de rnang rnams gdab //
T02D2191:73b-1: m'a g-yu lu zhes brjod la //
T02D2191:73b-2: dgang gzar blugs gzar dag gis dbul //
T02D2191:73b-3: zhi ba chu yi sbyin sreg go //
T02D2191:73b-4: gu gul dud pas bdug pa dang //
T02D2191:73b-5: bra ma'i lcag gis brab pa dang /
T02D2191:73b-6: khyung dang mthu chen bsdigs shing brab //
T02D2191:73b-7: mdongs kyis dud khung lta bur bya ba ;
T02D2191:73b-8: / rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyon byas la //
T02D2191:73b-9: gdon de dpag tshad brgyad khrir 'phang //
T02D2191:73b-10: gdon rigs nyi shu rtsa lnga la //
T02D2191:73b-11: sman yang rtsa lngas nad rnams 'joms //
T02D2191:73b-12: mthong ba'i dug dang reg pa'i dug / kha rlangs
T02D2191:73b-13: dug dang bsam pa'i dug / myos pa'i dug dang
T02D2191:73b-14: dug mtsho lnga // gtum po khros pa'i rgyud bzhin du //
T02D2191:73b-15: rten cing 'brel ba'i rdzas rnams dang //
T02D2191:73b-16: ye shes lha yi sngags kyis dgrol //
T02D2191:73b-17: mdze rigs sum brgya drug cu las //
T02D2191:73b-18: bsdu na bco brgyad shin tu brgyad //
T02D2191:73b-19: rtsa dang chu dang dbang po dangs //
T02D2191:73b-20: skra dang rus pa sen mo spu //
T02D2191:73b-21: dug dang rkyen dang rigs dang gdon /
T02D2191:73b-22: mngal dang srin bu chu dang ltas //
T02D2191:73b-23: dang po brtag pa gces pa yin //
T02D2191:73b-24: gnyis pa gso thabs bstan par bya //
T02D2191:73b-25: brtag pa brgyad la gso thabs gnyis //
T02D2191:73b-26: sman dang lha ru shes par bya //
T02D2191:73b-27: lha ni sngon du song ba yis //
T02D2191:73b-28: sman ni rten cing 'brel pa'i rdzas //
T02D2191:73b-29: bcangs pa tsam gyis bsrung ba'i mchog / rtsa bshal rtsub bshal rna bshal sogs //
T02D2191:73b-30: rngabs ru'i thabs sbyor dag dang ni //
T02D2191:73b-31: gtar dang me thur la sogs pas //
T02D2191:73b-32: rig pas dpyad la kun nas dgrol //
T02D2191:73b-33: mdze rigs brgyad la gso thabs brgyad //
T02D2191:73b-34: brtag thabs brgyad la man ngag brgyad //
T02D2191:73b-35: bla ma'i ngag gis brgyan par bya //
T02D2191:73b-36: dug la sman gyis gso bar bya //
T02D2191:73b-37: rkyen la rten cing 'brel ba'i thabs //
T02D2191:73b-38: rigs la rin chen gter gyis gzer //
T02D2191:73b-39: gdon la bya ba bsrungs lha yi sngags //
T02D2191:73b-40: mngal dang srin la rtsa bshal lo //
T02D2191:73b-41: chu la gtar dang de bzhin te ;
T02D2191:73b-42: / las la dge ba'i stobs kyis gso //
T02D2191:73b-43: lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo dag las //
T02D2191:73b-44: bdag nyid 'phags pas lung bstan pas //
T02D2191:73b-45: brtsam par mi 'os ma yin te //
T02D2191:73b-46: yang lag brgyad du de bshad do //
T02D2191:73b-47: rgyud kyi dgongs pa yan lag brgyad //
T02D2191:74a-0: lhag chad rgyal po bka' las @74a * //
T02D2191:74a-2: / zab mo sgrub thabs 'di bris pas //
T02D2191:74a-3: 'dir 'jug gsang bdag 'grub par shog / phyag na
T02D2191:74a-4: rdo rje'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba
